website_summaries.verdict: The active little princess in your life will get a costume and fairy wings with this tent and crawl tunnel combo.
pros: A lot of bang for your buck
A fairy princess tutu and tiara with wings come along with the play tent
Tunnel can detach for separate play space
Metal wires protected by plastic to prevent poking or injury
cons: Pictured balls do not come with this combo set

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my daughter for Christmas. This tent is very cute but poorly made. After a month of using, the stitching is coming out of the bottom of the part that covers the metal strip so now half the metal is exposed with huge hole in bottom because its coming apart at the seams. Don't waste your money. I wish I could give this zero stars. I am very disappointed it didn't last very long and now my daughter who has mild autism and loves tents is now without it and I have to purchase a new tent but will not be another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Fiberglass frame ! Beware
customer_reviews.text: The overall material, structure, quality and construction of the tents/ costume/ tunnel are EXCELLENT. It was More than what I would have anticipated receiving. The tents were as described and the costumes were just as pictured. None of the items came in damaged or defective. MY BIGGEST CONCERN is the use of fiberglass frame connectors! Upon setting up the tent and putting the frames in....I got a handful of tiny, damn near invisible shards stuck all over both my hands. I have a 1.5yr and 5yr old, if for any reason they shattered the framing they would be embedded in shards. For that reason alone i cannot give this the 5 stars it would have deserved.
customer_reviews.author: L.bearh

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk!! Lasted my toddlers 1 day
customer_reviews.text: I almost ordered a single tent for my toddlers. One that had very good reviews. For some reason I chose this instead and now I regret it. My 2 and 3 year old's opened this gift Christmas morning. They loved it. By the end of the day, the ribbons that hold the fiberglass were ripped out of the tent and the tents would no longer stand up. It's now December 28th, 2019, only 3 days after this gift was unwrapped and the tents are ready for the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Will not last
customer_reviews.text: Pretty upset that one day after being purchased the item was falling apart, strings were beginning to fall off. Then that lead to the sticks to hold it sturdy we’re not able to stand tall anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Grisel Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Very GOOD quality!
customer_reviews.text: It really does deserve 5 stars! I didn’t expect it to be as good quality as it is! I bought this for my twins boy/girl twins 2nd birthday & my 4yr old son plays with them too, they play rough & it still holds up even when they turn it over! I think this will last them until they out grow it & they love it. The costumes are so cute & very good quality, they would make great Halloween costumes too. I am posting a review video on my YouTube channel, search for The Scott Squad & look in my playlist section if you want to see it.
customer_reviews.author: The Scott Squad

customer_reviews.title: 3 kids from 7 to 9 months all have a blast!
customer_reviews.text: I have three children and they have all invested hours and hours of make believe with these. There is plenty of room for them to play and imagine, or even read a book. So far they have held up to a lot of make believe fun and reading books! Excited to have them set up for kiddos to read and have quiet time in them too! I wasn't sure when ordering if I would be for sure getting the bundle as pictures based on other reviews but I did get the bundle and my kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: TSZ

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED USED
customer_reviews.text: So this definitely arrived USED... bag was torn and parts were inside of a grocery bag. I want a NEW REPLACEMENT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon mom

customer_reviews.title: 3 year daughter and 20ish lbs cat love it
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected can stand better but for the price I'm beyond impressed super cute high quality material folds up easy and easy to put to took easier with 2 ppl but I did it alone in about 20 mins should take less than 10 with 2 ppl my 3 years daughter's loves it she crawls around and bought balls for ball put to add in it her and my cat both love if you're for a study cat play area or toddler play area this perfect for both will buying a second to add to this one soon
customer_reviews.author: Amanda m.

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this setup. The value is there but you get what you pay for. It is not easily set up and taken down, it is a process. One of the tent poles has splintered and is no longer usable. One of the tie cords has torn from the tent wall and at the base there is a hole next to the tent pole insertion. The kids enjoyed it and still do. However there is some holes in the side of the tent. It doesn't hold up to usual kid play. The additional outfits that came with are adorable but will not hold up long.
customer_reviews.author: loveshopping

customer_reviews.title: We almost got excited...
customer_reviews.text: Great material for the tent and good size as well. My littles were very disappointed when one of the plastic stands broke with in minutes of playing with it. I was hoping to use this in our church classroom but if it couldn't even with stand 3 kiddos playing ages: 1, 3 & 4. Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Javier Jay Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as a 9 piece boy & girl combo and all I got was one girl tent that looks nothing like the picture with one tunnel. No dress up pieces or blue tent like pictured. I’m keeping it because it’s already opened and set-up and I don’t have the heart to take it from my kids now. I gave 2 stars only because the 2 pieces we did receive seem okay.
customer_reviews.author: Remie R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Really love it! Purchased this for my daughter who turns two next month. I was kind of wary because if the reviews stating there wasn't a hole for the tunnel, but there most certainly is. It was super easy to set up! And my daughter loves it. However, the reason this gets 4stars and not 5, the fairy wings that came with it are not rainbow. They are red and full of glitter. I've already spoken to customer service and they have taken care of me on that front. Honestly the wings aren't that big of an issue, because that's not why I made this purchase. But now my house is covered in glitter😂😂
customer_reviews.author: ToniaA

customer_reviews.title: It comes with a convenient carrying case making it easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: This unique pop up tent is a dream come true for little girls and little boys alike. It comes with a tunnel to crawl to an adventure inside a castle. It comes with a convenient carrying case making it easy to transport. It's bright colors attract the most curious children and is even better when supplemented with assorted colored play balls. It has provided hours of fun for the little ones in my life. I would recommend this prince/princess castle to parents and grandparents alike.
customer_reviews.author: Cramsey

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: We got our item at first, but one of the poles was longer than the rest and it ripped the top of one of the tents. So, we returned it and the customer service was great, and they got us a new one. This one was fine, with all of the poles the right length, but the kids have already put a rip in the screen of one of the tents. Not the product's fault, but it's not super sturdy if you've got 4-5 year olds running around in them
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good, cute inexpensive tent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 15 month old. Overall it's a pretty good tent for the price. Not hard to set up. It would be nice if the poles went into a slot instead of them being exposed the way they are. The manufacture's recommended age is 3 years and up so I knew I had to make sure I checked for the small parts and places my daughter might get hurt. I covered the metal part of the poles with a soft material just in case. I gave it 4 stars because part of the material by the door and an elastic strap was ripped. But as I said, for the price it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this ! This has become her hide out space away from her younger brother where she can have privacy to read books, color or play with other toys. Set up is so very easy, the tunnel springs into shape as soon as the elastic closures are undone. The tent part is put together with flexible stakes that hold it upright. It is spacious enough that she can bring in several dolls and have room to play inside. Comes in a zippered carrying case which makes storage and portability a breeze. The tent is very lightweight but durable and easy to clean any spills with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bell Chute

customer_reviews.title: 😠 my kids were upset
customer_reviews.text: I just received only the girl package 😕 and was the old model
customer_reviews.author: Lucezita

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for kids
customer_reviews.text: B4 i purchased this I read the reviews and that's why I'm satisfied because honest people post there likes and dislikes and now brought to post fake reviews: this is awesome my kids enjoy it they had fun and help them create a imagination: they laugh and play
customer_reviews.author: David Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like these tents. I have twin 3 year old daughters and having a tent each they could play in and crawl to seemed like a great idea. However, less than a month of play (Christmas gift) the pink tent is already coming apart. This isn’t even a toy they play with all the time. So now since the tent pole keeps sliding out they no longer want to play inside. They are pretty sad about the pink tent. I’m sad at the waste of money. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Cute castle
customer_reviews.text: The castles were bigger than I expected. I could fit inside with my 3 year old, I'm 5'2. My daughter love her new castle and the fairy set costume. The fairy wing does have golden glitter on it and it gets everywhere. Another problem is the upper tag that suppose to connect the pink castle to tunnel is missing. Overall my daughter really love her new castle.
customer_reviews.author: Mina C.

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with the design on this tent. It looks beautiful. When I recieved it I realized it's more purple than I was expecting. It did not come with instructions, but it was very simple to put together. Since the tunnel doesn't attach, we don't use it. My daughter won't crawl in or out of the tent with the tunnel in the opening. She has a blast playing in it though. It looks like she will have lots of hours of adventures in it. Overall I'm pretty happy with it. The only thing I would change is the tunnel attaching and I would love it if it were more pink.
customer_reviews.author: Nessy

customer_reviews.title: items arrived defective!
customer_reviews.text: we bought this set for our 2 kids. set them up today, and discovered one of the tents is defective. the door flap is missing, though it clearly WAS there at some point as you can see the stitching and holes. there is also a hole at the very top, allowing one of the poles to pop right through. not sure if it was just a quality control issue or if we were sent a used product, but either way - not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: jayjay marie

customer_reviews.title: Misleading and disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product it's supposed to be a 6 piece bundle and I only received the tent and the tunnel. the tutu and butterfly wings and wand were missing. It's very misleading because it says it comes with a 6 piece bundle and I only received two pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca R. Cipolla

customer_reviews.title: I love this castle
customer_reviews.text: I love this castle! It is so cute, so far my 1 year old seems to love it as well. I do wish it was a bit sturdier, as the place where the tunnel attaches isn’t very stable and does not attach well to say the least. I also wish the poles that hold it up were not exposed on the inside, my daughter found one almost immediately and pulled it out of place. Other than that it is adorable and hopefully it will hold up for a while because I know she would enjoy playing in this tent for a long time if it does! Very easy setup and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jen E.

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2-yr old daughter loves it. We haven't set the blue one up because our son is only 3-mos, but I love that he'll have a matching one. My daughter is really rough and the tent has taken a beating with little tears here and there. Not as sturdy as I'd like, but to be fair it's probably designed for 3 and up and my girl is a bulldozer... Oh! And she loves the fairy costume!! Very cute bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Michele C

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this castle tent. It's very sturdy and able to withstand being pummeled by multiple children. It works really great for daytime play as well as a decorative piece for the slumber party. Really girly and evoke creativity in the children as the girls created storylines to go with playing with the castle. The tunnel isn't attached which makes it a great feature because it can be used in conjunction with the tent or stand alone. Additionally the carrying case the tent came in makes it really easy to take down and store underneath the bed. I wish I had one when I was a little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great set! I do wish the costumes were of better quality (as they're of really poor quality), but they're not the reason we purchased this set, the costumes were a bonus, and we are really satisfies with the main items in the set: the tents and the tunnel. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Very durable! Daughter loves to play in it and no sign of tears. Wish there was a flap that could go over the hole if the tunnel is off so it's completely closed. Otherwise great tent for price! Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: MACK525

customer_reviews.title: This Product IS Not Pink, or as it seems in the ad
customer_reviews.text: So, the picture looks great. A nice pink castle for my daughter, but that's not the case here. IT IS ACTUALLY DARK PURPLE IN COLOR and the tunnel is completely dark purple as well. No see-through areas as shown in the images for this product. I mean, if my daughter liked purple, I WOULD HAVE BOUGHT A PUPLE ONE, BUT it very misleading when you place pics of a pink product, then sending out purple products in their place...
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: PAINFUL. UNSAFE. Tough assembly, unsafe fiberglass poles.
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled (took about 40 minutes to assemble both tents), the tents were a joy to play in until touching the fiberglass poles. Kids have invisible shards of glass in their hands and the pain is impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Junk and dangerous. We bought these tents for our twins. We haven’t had them a week and the rods that hold the tents up are already broken. They splintered and apparently made of fiberglass. My son and I got several splinters from them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome. We bought it for our daughters 1st birthday and it has been a hit for months. Even our son loves getting in there with her. It's so pretty and seems to be made very well. I also love that the tunnel has the see-through mesh because she isn't afraid to go through it since she can see up as well. I would definitely buy again if needed and have recommended it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Sara and Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for twins
customer_reviews.text: The twins loved the costumes immediately who are slightly under 2yrs old...we only pulled out the tunnel and they enjoyed that...I still recommend...its like any other pop up tent tunnels except perfect if you have twins this was just perfect...we gifted the perfect gift 🙏💖😁😍
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Torres

customer_reviews.title: It would have been much better if the tunnel attached but since it is flexible ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this princess tent is cute. The material is a bit thin so it might not last for years and years but it does work to keep kids entertained for a while. It would have been much better if the tunnel attached but since it is flexible you can get it to fit in the door of the tent to make it equally as fun. The design is really cute because little girls feel more like a princess. The tent is pretty easy to assemble in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly79

customer_reviews.title: Fun Castle-Needs velcro
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute castle tent. My granddaughter loves going through the tunnel. The only thing I would change is to make the ties that hold the poles in place strong Velcro straps instead. If you don't double knot them, they will loosen and come undone. And since she isn't at our house all the time we have to take it apart and store it. Undoing a double knot with these ties is no fun. I think I may look into adding Velcro to it myself. I would still recommend it, its a good height for an adult to sit in with a child which is the main reason I got it.
customer_reviews.author: caskids

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and granddaughter got these for Christmas. They are loving them!! I'm surprised by how roomy they are! My grandson is 6 and fits in his comfortably!! Definitely worth the cost, and the costumes are great fun!!
customer_reviews.author: crystal stewart

customer_reviews.title: Many creative uses for the castle tent.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute princess tent. Everyone likes to play inside. I bought it for my granddaughter, but the cat and dog like to play with her inside the tent. We play in the ball pit and spend time reading and playing with other toys. I can’t wait for our first overnight in the tent when she gets older. I imagine we will use the castle tent for many years. The princess outfit is an added bonus! This item is such a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised - empty handed for Xmas
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 tent and not as pictured!! Now I am empty handed for my son and daughter for Xmas. I am supposed to have two tents boy and girl and as pictured with the bundle price. The tent I got is a flower tent that looks nothing like the photo. Scam? Why do some people have what is advertised and others just have the girl. There wasn’t an option to pick as it say boy and girl bundled for $44.
customer_reviews.author: JpR

customer_reviews.title: Great play tent for little ones
customer_reviews.text: We just received this today and I'm really impressed. It took about 5 minutes to put together, with a one year climbing in it and on me the entire time. It's really cute and my daughter loves it! She's been playing in it since it came out of the box. She's a little young for the fairy accessories but she'll grow into them. Especially for this price, I definitely recommend this play tent. I'm actually buying another one for my two year old for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Allisongio1

customer_reviews.title: surprised great-grandchildren loved their Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Two of our great grandchildren live a long distance from us so we were unable to see how much they enjoyed the tent bundle. They dressed up and prince and princess and spent many happy hours playing in it. They aren't happy about having to take it down (since it took up most of a bedroom space) but are looking forward to setting it up on the patio when the weather warms.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: I don't really think this tent would be good for a ball pit as there is nothing to ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this tent for our 2 year old daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it. The first night she got it, she kept grabbing my hand so we could sit together inside! She also loves going through the tunnel...as do our dog and cat! I don't really think this tent would be good for a ball pit as there is nothing to stop the balls from going out the door, but I guess that doesn't really bother me. My daughter likes it without the balls.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great fun for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these play tents! They are so easy to assemble, and have a mesh bag to store it in. The tent folds up flat into the circular mesh bag and zips shut, so really can be stored anywhere. And as I stated it's super easy to put up. It's also nice because if you have other play tents and tunnels, even of a different brand, they can all 've put together to make adding on easy and much more fun! These tents make great gifts and a great time, hours of fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne L.

customer_reviews.title: Our 2-yr old granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This play tent is AWESOME. We gave it to our granddaughter for her 2nd birthday: she played in the tunnel immediately and had a lot of fun with it. But after the play tent was set up, that was pretty much the end of the tunnel (hahaha). She LOVES the play tent. We also gave her 300 balls to put inside of it; she likes to roll around in the balls and of course she likes to throw them out of the tent just as fast as we throw them back IN. I've seen her roll the tent on to its side without damaging to the tent -- it's held up really well to a rambunctious 2-year old.
customer_reviews.author: K30146

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes the poles came undone and my two year old had it in her hand.
customer_reviews.text: I love the tents my children love to play inside the tunnel keeps coming apart. I only had it for two days so I really don’t know the durability of it yet. Seems to be good. I love the look of it so cute!! It comes with everything you see in the picture. I am very happy with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for princesses!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters, ages 7, 4 and 2, absolutely loved this tent! It was a little harder to set up than other pop up tents but that is because I needed to set up the poles for the stability. And stability it provides! It is very well put together and the girls have already christened it with a tea party. I also love the portability of this tent. It will easily go with us on play dates or be moved all over the house. Yes, the tunnel doesn't attach, but it's still an awesome playtime tent.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Nice little play tents
customer_reviews.text: These are not the easiest to set up and kids can't get to rambunctious while playing in them. 4 yr. old grandson enjoyed them while visiting.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.text: Edited. 2 weeks of play and this thing is destroyed. She literally only walks through the door and back out and its a mess. So far the play tent seems sturdy. It's great for our daughter who is turning 2. She played with one at a friends house and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent with lots of play room
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tent for my 1 year old niece and my son to play in together. Nice colors and lots of room. The costumes were really cute also. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: qhlvr2

customer_reviews.title: KIDS LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for both 2 girls and 2 boys all cousins. You can put all connected together or keep separate. VERY Spacious and an adult can sit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this castle. We are not using the balls with this but she likes to put a blanket and pillow inside and pretend to camp. This came packed very neatly and I imagine could be mobile, however we use it in the kids bedroom and they love to go in and out of it. Even thought the tunnel does not attach it still is fun for them to crawl through. She was extremely excited when this arrived and plays with it every day. Easy to put up too.
customer_reviews.author: LissaM

customer_reviews.title: ASSEMBLY REQUIRED:SUPPORT RODS.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly very confusing. Diagram not helpdul dor placement of rods. Ah5ould have read description. Thought it was a pop up tent like most of similar items that require no assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Javableu

customer_reviews.title: so easy to set up!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tent. When it arrived in the mail, i took it out and had it set up in less than 10 minutes! The kids love it! It has little mesh windows to look out and it has plenty of room, my 7 year old and 18 month old played in there together. The tunnel apparently just goes through the main door, that's where we put it. The kinda liked having to crawl through it to get in there. My kids had hours of fun in there the first day it was up!
customer_reviews.author: R.Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Great...while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give it more stars because it was nice and spacious and my 2 yr old twins absolutely loved it, only thing is it didn't last very long the material isn't very strong so it didn't stand up to they're in and out play time which is a shame because we really did like it while it lasted...
customer_reviews.author: Brandi H.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute pop up castle tent
customer_reviews.text: Super cute pop up castle tent. I absolutely love it. My little one is only 12 months old so she can't really use it safely yet. She tries to put weight on the sides of the tent, then it tips over. Not safe for wee ones. But we bought it for the tunnel right now anyway. We're going to just save the pop up castle for when she's older. I nocked off 1 star because the color was running on the castles fabric in certain areas. But it's not super noticable.
customer_reviews.author: LMartin

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it and so do I
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old girl and almost 2 year old boy who absolutely adore this playset. It's unreal for the price with everything included. There was a bit of a learning curve but setup and breakdown are relatively easy. Only thing, I wish the tent poles were more durable, my toddler is a bit of a maniac and I'm afraid of splintering. As expected for the price, I'm not disappointed at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids enjoyment for hours.
customer_reviews.text: The kids seemed to really enjoy their new castle tents.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Mitzen

customer_reviews.title: Mold in tent
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product arrived in the bag with a tear and mold in the inside of one of the tents.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Grant

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoyed them
customer_reviews.text: The Cape started to shred after 15 minutes of wear. The tents were a bit more complex than I originally thought but no problems, roomy and the 3 y.o. and 17 month old loved it. The tunnel worked well . I loved the fact it was contained in a bag with little storage space required. It arrived as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every princess needs her castle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I lover purple and so does my daughter and love the princess style of the tent. She had a Frozen tent, but this one is much roomier. Not sure I would put any balls in it like the product displays, but great place for my daughter to let her imagination flow as a princess in her own castle tent! There is enough room to even have a friend in there with her! The tunnel is nice too, but the tent is used more.
customer_reviews.author: sunsetatdawn

customer_reviews.title: Fun Tents
customer_reviews.text: The tents are cute and lots of fun to play inside. They are big enough for an adult to sit inside, which is good because you have to get in the tent to put the tent poles in place. The design is nice, but they could be more durable. One of the seams has torn after just a day of playing. It will not be too hard to mend, but it would better not to have to mend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute princess castle! It's easy to set up, has a large area for play inside. The tunnel is see thru which I like. The top of the castle has 3 little Pom Pom like decor which adds to the cuteness of this play tent.
customer_reviews.author: StacieLS

customer_reviews.title: It is absolutely beautiful and very well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter this fairy tent with tunnel for Christmas. This by far exceeded my expectations! It is absolutely beautiful and very well made. It came with a little skirt, fairy wings, wand, and headband that are so adorable! I looked everywhere for the perfect tent/tunnel for her and this is by far the best. My little one loves it so much!! I absolutely recommend this for anyone looking for the perfect tent set up for their little one.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne M.

customer_reviews.title: My kids play for hours!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these tents! And yes I also connected the tunnel in between the tents so they can crawl back and forth to each other’s tents. It’s very easy to set up also. I haven’t used the dress up costumes that came with it yet though, but they seem really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tent for my daughter's first birthday. It was very easy to pop up, it took less than 5 minutes total. Not only does my toddler love it, my two older girls do as well. (Ages 6 and 10.) I don't usually leave review but this tent was so much nicer than I though it would be! We love it and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a fun play tent.
customer_reviews.author: Karlyn Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE This
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for our kiddos up at the office. They immediately started playing with it and even wanted to have their nap time in the tents. So far, the tents have held up well. The tents are very large, so the kids will be able to play with them for many years. The set comes with a nice storage bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: SouthPaw

customer_reviews.title: Great tent and tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and great price. I was slightly disappointed with the fit of the tunnel to the tent. It attached with the elastic straps used to collapse the tunnel so its not a tight fit as shown in the picture and separates easily and a lot when my daughter is climbing through it, so much so that it annoyed her and we detached it. She loves both the tunnel and the tent separately.
customer_reviews.author: K Matlock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bundle!
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain and excellent bundle. Recieved the two tents with connecting crawl tube and two fun costumes. My daughters are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: J Swink

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size pop up girl tent.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 9 month old daughter. It came quick, clean and neat packaging. Easy instructions to follow. Took 5 mins to out together. She immediately got in and started exploring. Its is built well, beautiful pattern and I love that its not typical princess pink. It feels like an English cottage. The crawl tube is fun and she already figured that out. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I received a returned one
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I received a returned one. It came, missing the wand, broken headband and with a hole in the screen on the tent. Was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!! well made
customer_reviews.text: this is made quite well,honestly much better than expected. u can never go wrong with a lil place for your lil one 2 call their own... but bonus,your princess not only gets her own castle,she gets her princess wardrobe 2 go with it! most importantly her magic wand!! I definetly recommend this for your princess
customer_reviews.author: tsnotmyname

customer_reviews.title: its like in her own La La land
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for somedays now, and my daughter loves it, its like in her own La La land, she spends most of the time playing inside it. escpecially the Tunnel, its so nice, you can still see your baby playing, and crawling through the tunnel. Assembling it so easy, it took less than 10 minutes. The materials is nice, and we liked the design, colors and drawing.
customer_reviews.author: Rami Khalid

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to her playroom!!
customer_reviews.text: Got for my grand daughter's birthday. She loved it....Does not come with balls, you have to purchase them separately. It is large enough for my 15 year old and my grand daughter, as she bosses him around and makes him set in it....lol Also, their large german shepard plays in it with her.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The package did come with two tents (pink & blue), a tunnel and the costumes. Easy to assemble and the kids loved it. The only con is that it's not sturdy enough and the tunnel doesn't stay put
customer_reviews.author: Faisel Farooq

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful and fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters favorite toy! I purchased this for rainy days with my toddler. This is now always up now in her room and she loves it! We added 400 plastic balls and it was a perfect amount. The print on the outside is beautiful and looks like it is out of a storybook! The setup and breakdown is so easy. I love how small it folds up for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: 1lostkid

customer_reviews.title: Super cool play tent
customer_reviews.text: Super cool play tent! Builds up easy, and very sturdy. I bought one girl and one boy tent for my 3 and 5 year olds. We connected them all and created a giant tunnel system in their playroom :) they are having a hay day! It comes in a cool little carrying zipup case. So when they are done playing, you can fold them up quickly and store them away. Don't take much room, we store them under the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I expected! All 3 of my kids can sit inside...10, 3 & 1 yr old. And it's pretty sturdy for a play tent. It's absolutely adorable. The only thing i dislike is the way the tunnel connects to the castle... It moves around and out of place a bit. It should attach to the castle better. Overall I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Summer Fun
customer_reviews.text: Love these tents, easy to set up and the kids were dressed up and playing outside in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Alexrachal

customer_reviews.title: Princess Castle Fun
customer_reviews.text: My two and a half year old loves her new princess castle. We placed a soft chair in it for her so she can read her books comfortably. The house can comfortably fit 2 to 3 small children at a time which is great for play dates. It fits perfectly in our family room play area and was easy to assemble. The castle has an opening for the crawl tunnel making this an even more fun and enjoyable toy. This would be a great Christmas present but who doesn't like a new toy just because.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyMama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome playhouse!
customer_reviews.text: The wings broke after only the second wear, but for the price, what was I to expect. The playhouse however is awesome! My kids crawl in and out of it constantly and it has held up beautifully. My daughter loves to pull blankets and books in there! It’s her special place. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Michael LaLena

customer_reviews.title: Great little princess castle
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for my daughter expecting her to "kind of like it" and man was it a hit! She loves it, plays hide and seek with the cousins and is showing it off when she has visitors...even months later hahaha love it!
customer_reviews.author: CMo

customer_reviews.title: The tunnel is her favorite part but the bag is mine!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new tent. I got it for her birthday and couldn't wait to give it to her and so happy I did. I put it outside with the tunnel on and she kept going in and out. When it was time to come inside she started pulling it with her. I set up just the tent in her room and she fell asleep in it. I love how it collapses and goes right back in the bag that comes with it. The ball that are pictured do not come with it. Fun can be had even without them.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey P

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pink/purple princess tent. The tent itself wasn't very durable. It she'd all the strings from the seams and the stilts wouldn't fit properly. The only thing left (that is durable) is the tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Warthon

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old daughter and she loved it. She loves to be a princess and now she had her own castle! It was super easy to put up and the take down is really easy. You have to buy balls for it but I didnt need them. The castle is well made and the front door is like a flap. It comes zipped up in a nice carrying case. All in all its a great purchase that my daughter loves.
customer_reviews.author: Etrodri0324

customer_reviews.title: A lot fun with simple effort..
customer_reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised by how much we received for so little $$! We purchased this as something we can use both inside and outside. Super easy to pop up or fold up to put away to bring back inside in the carrying bag.. Our daughter will have loads of fun years to come with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Dalimook

customer_reviews.title: Difficult setup/take-down
customer_reviews.text: Too difficult to set up/take down. There are very short ties around the inside of the top which you use to tie the support sticks. They are too short and you must climb inside the castle (not easy for a large person) to tie them. Velcro or clips would be much easier. Everything else was decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K.

customer_reviews.title: GRANDKIDS LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids LOVE these. They can play together or separately in their own rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Tlynn

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t last long. Ripped very easily. The poles are made from fiberglass and they broke easily. While trying to fix they gave me splinters. Not my favorite product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not the best quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute tent, really love the way it looks. Unfortunately it's kind of flimsy. One of the ties that holds the poles ripped off the first day, there is a hole in the seam that connects the side and bottom and that was day 1. Not sure how long it will last which is a shame because it's such a beautiful tent and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: NatashaK

customer_reviews.title: The cats and the baby love it. We use the tunnel separately from the ...
customer_reviews.text: The cats and the baby love it. We use the tunnel separately from the castle. It doesn't position well in the castle, or stay in place with the two attaching areas. We just use the tunnel by itself in the living room and have the castle set up in the bed room.
customer_reviews.author: MeganE

customer_reviews.title: Made for a princess
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for all the little princesses. Pretty easy and fast to put together. Easy to clean. Cute design. Maybe would just a window that can be opened/rolled up. My daughter(5 yr) loves playing inside with her toys and cats. Unlike other toys she has had, this one keeps her attention for a long time, giving me time to do my chores, etc. So LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Luv2buy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tent and tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tent and tunnel !! We just it yesterday and my kids are already loving it. The fabric is light, stitches are strong and is so easy to set up that my son did it by himself. The product looks very stable, sturdy and its perfectly safe. Both my kids are constantly playing in the tent. It is quite easy to collapse and be stored in a cool bag (included). Great product at a great price. Loving it....
customer_reviews.author: Srivats

customer_reviews.title: Cute tents!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Super cute. Kids love crawling through the tunnel. The tents are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking and pockets for the poles rip very easily. Tunnel hole stays open if the tunnel isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap looking and pockets for the poles rip very easily. Tunnel hole stays open if the tunnel isn't being used??!! It's nice that it comes with an outfit. My daughter likes it of course . Easy assembly .
customer_reviews.author: ShailaYuri

customer_reviews.title: not a pretty sight.
customer_reviews.text: When we received this one of the inside ties that holds a tent pole was missing. Also we didn't get the wand, tutu, wings, and tiara. I had to crawl inside, steal a tie from another pole, and sew it on to tie the missing one. I'm a tall guy and it took forever, not a pretty sight.
customer_reviews.author: Casey N. Precourt

customer_reviews.title: Buy it -she will be so happy for sure
customer_reviews.text: Amazing surprise for my baby !!!! We got the castle ,and little butterfly wings as costume for little girl etc as extras from seller ! Love it ! We had so much fun with taking the pictures and playing around - castle is big enough that even an adult can get in
customer_reviews.author: Katarzynka32

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this purchase and I'm sure my daughter will ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a Christmas gift for my 1 year old daughter. It is extremely well made. I also ordered what I thought were the appropriate non-crush balls to go inside the tent but they were the wrong side. It would be helpful for the manufacturer to provide suggestions on the type and size of balls to purchase since they are shown in the image. Other than that, I am very pleased with this purchase and I'm sure my daughter will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: JaKeitha Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Play House get away
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves this too her and the dog plays in the tent lol only thing I don't like is that it falls if the handles are not in correctly that keeps it up other than that she enjoys playing inside of it
customer_reviews.author: Agee

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this tent
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this tent! My baby too. The material is good and breathable. The structure is a little fragile but its OK. My only complain is the "pocket" made to hold the sticks and keep the support of the tent. My bad easily removed two of the sticks and half of the castle went down.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Pozeti

customer_reviews.title: A pop up castle that stores away in 2 steps
customer_reviews.text: This set was one of many Christmas gifts for my 2 1/2 year old granddaughter Piper. She absolutely LOVED being a butterfly princess of her own little castle. My son loves how it all folds up into its own carrying case that takes up very little room. Highly recommend this set. It’s durable and can be tucked away when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for kids to put together and an adult has to climb inside which is a super pain if you have back problems
customer_reviews.text: Cute tent. Too hard for kids to put together and an adult has to climb inside which is a super pain if you have back problems. Also one of the poles came broken. It was a present for my daughter's birthday so it didn't get opened for over a month so we can't return it unfortunately. But it's super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Boden

product_meta.title: Playz 10-Piece Boys & Girls Dress Up Castle Play Tent Bundle with Crawl Tunnel, Butterfly Wings, Tiara Crown, Princess Wand, Tutu Dress Up Costume, Superhero Cape and Mask for Prince & Princess
product_meta.description:
Playz® - An Emerging Leader in the Toy Industry – Based in the USA

Let your boys and girls play day come to life with this perfect his and hers dress up play tent combo set. Featuring a beautiful pink tent for the little ladies and a superhero style blue tent for the boys. The butterfly dress up costume and superhero boys outfit allows kids to play make believe! 

DETAILS & FEATURES
1) Excellent to encourage imaginative and creative play.
2) Mesh window and sunroof allow air to circulate and keeps the bugs out.
3) Small size yet spacious interior allows usage in a compact home or playroom.
4) Includes sturdy flexible poles for quick and easy assembly of tent.
5) Stow it away just as fast as you set it up. Folds flat inside lightweight carrying case for convenient storage.
6) Easy to clean material with a damp cloth or mild soap.
7) Beautiful colors and patented unique design will allow your girls tent to standout from all the others!!!

What’s Inside the Package?
‣ 2 x Castle Play Tent w/ Sunroofs: 55” Height – 39” Base Diameter - $80 VALUE!
‣ 1 x Mesh Tunnel: 42” Length – 18.5” Diameter - $15 VALUE!
‣ 1 x Lightweight, Compact Zipper Carrying Case – 20” Width - $10 VALUE!
‣ 2 x Princess & Superhero Dress Up Set - $30 VALUE!
‣ 1 x Instructions

TOTAL VALUE OF $135!
You will be making a wise financial choice by choosing our product.
You will rest at ease knowing your kids are playing in a safe environment that is tested to be free of LEAD, LATEX, PHTHALATES, & BPA.
You will give the kids an extremely fun toy that will keep them occupied for hours.
You can now listen to a few extra hours of joy & laughter everyday while giving yourself some time to relax. Lets face it, being a parent or babysitter is not easy!

We truly care about customer service & want to deliver a great overall experience. 100% Money Back Guarantee!
feature_bullets: NEW LIMITED TIME BOYS & GIRLS BUNDLE! - Children love playing with our premium his and hers tent set! BUTTERFLY WINGS, MAGIC WAND, HEAD BAND TIARA, TUTU SKIRT DRESS, BOYS CAPE & MASK ARE NOW INCLUDED! Excellent christmas or birthday present!
PRINCE & PRINCESS APPROVED - Soft fabric & breathable mesh design allows for a safe & environmental friendly playground for the kids. Playz toys meet & exceed all USA CPSC Toy Safety Guidelines.
SIMPLE & STURDY - Portable, durable, easy to setup & foldable with a lightweight zipper carrying bag for convenient storage. ** POP UP BALL PIT BALLS NOT INCLUDED **

KIDS TENT WITH PIT BALLS ★ Purchase with Playz Pit Balls under ASIN B07C5F2TNG and use the fun play set at parties, picnics, backyard BBQs, parks, playgrounds, day care, school, carnivals, sleepovers, or simply keep it in the playroom at home! Great for dogs, cats, pets as well.
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - Do your research! When you purchase a Playz product, you know the premium quality you will get. We care about ours kids, so don’t settle for anything but the best!
